definition: consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: In this thesis, a medical image teleconsultation system has been designed and researched.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了一个远程影像会诊系统的设计与研究。

sentences.english: Objecive To investigate the effect of Consultation-Liaison Psychiatry(CLP)on the general hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨会诊联络精神病学在综合医院的作用。

sentences.english: The surgeon visits to discuss the cases twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生每两周例行会诊并讨论病例。
紧急行眼科会诊是十分必要的。

sentences.english: These specialist doctors usually work in hospitals and are known as "consultants".
sentences.chinese: 这些专科医生通常在医院工作也被称为会诊医生。

sentences.english: I’m afraid we’ll have to reschedule the consultation.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我们得重新安排这次会诊时间。

sentences.english: Wuhan Xiehe Hospital expert consultation has arrived in Xiantao treatment.
sentences.chinese: 武汉协和医院的专家已赶到仙桃会诊治疗。

sentences.english: The Medical Practitioner Band IV consultation benefit now includes some anesthetist consultations .
sentences.chinese: 一些麻醉师被包括在等级IV的医生会诊保障内。

sentences.english: Recently, the provincial health department deputy director Liao Xinbo rate experts went to consultation.
sentences.chinese: 近日，省卫生厅副厅长廖新波率专家亲赴会诊。

sentences.english: Preliminary medical expert consultation diagnosed as AIDS.
sentences.chinese: 内科专家会诊初步诊断为艾滋病。
治疗需要紧急眼科会诊。

sentences.english: He is at the invitation of his students in Henan's Shangcai county to conduct the consultations.
sentences.chinese: 他是应他的学生之邀到河南的上蔡县进行会诊的。

definition: (TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]
to transfer (a patient for treatment in a different hospital)
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
to provide critical care (to a patient or a diseased plant)
